title: Chloe Ferry squeezes her curves into bedazzled dress for Geordie Shore filming
text:
Filming for Geordie Shore has resumed in Newcastle this week, with brand new cast member Amelia Lily spotted for the first time.

And veteran cast member Chloe Ferry was showing the former X Factor star how it's done when they descend upon the Toon's finest nightclubs on Thursday night.

The MTV star, 24, squeezed her hourglass curves into a diamanté embellished mini dress for the occasion.

Back on the Toon: Chloe Ferry returned to Geordie Shore filming on Thursday night alongside brand new cast member Amelia Lily

In a rush: The bubbly blonde was seen downing her drink in the back of a cab as the cast pulled up in the town centre

Chloe's yellow frock was a rather demure choice for the party-loving star, who usually opts to flash a little more flesh.

The TV personality added a pair of Perspex heels and styled her long extensions in a poker straight style.

The bubbly blonde was seen downing her drink in the back of a cab as the cast pulled up in the town centre.

Covering up: Chloe's yellow frock was a rather demure choice for the party-loving star, who usually opts to flash a little more flesh

Joining the cast: Brand new cast member Amelia Lily (left) - best known for her time on The X Factor - has been spotted for the first time

Golden girl: The MTV star, 24, squeezed her hourglass curves into a diamanté embellished mini dress for the occasion

Besties: She was in high spirits as she walked along with Nathan Henry - having apparently lost her shoes en route

Amelia looked like she was right at home, strutting along in a revealing black lace dress.

The 25-year-old star showed off her tanned legs in the ruffled garment, which featured sheer sleeves and mullet hemline.

Not returning for this series are Sam Gowland, Tahlia Chung and Sophie Kasaei, but Geordie Shore OG James Tindale is back for another outing.

Chloe looked delighted to be filming without her ex Sam, 24, and is hoping to finally move on from their turbulent relationship.

Daring: Amelia looked like she was right at home, strutting along in a revealing black lace dress

Frilly frock: The 25-year-old star showed off her tanned legs in the ruffled garment, which featured sheer sleeves and mullet hemline

Putting her best foot forward: TV bosses believe singer Amelia will be an 'explosive' addition to the show

Here she comes: Abbie Holborn was looking lovely in a printed minidress and thigh-high boots

Turning heads: Abbie ensured all eyes were on her in her thigh-skimming choice of attire

The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she vehemently denied.

'Chloe has completely wiped her hands of Sam and she wants him out of her life for good, during the last series Sam kept chopping in and out of the show and it left Chloe in a really bad place.'

The source added Sam was 'given the shove because of the chaos', while a different source told the publication that he wasn't part of the show at present but that 'doesn't mean he won't return'.

He's back: Geordie Shore OG James Tindale is returning to the reality show

Getting along famously: Amelia appeared to have made herself right at home

Having a blast: Also joining Abbie (left) for their night out was Bethan Kershaw (right)

Meanwhile, Amelia's sighting comes as confirmation of reports she'll be taking part in the show - eight years after she rose to fame on The X Factor, the same year as winners Little Mix.

A source told The Sun: 'Bosses are made up they've signed Amelia for the show and promise she will make it the best series yet, she's always up for a laugh and will make great telly for viewers.

'Amelia's not shy about saying what she thinks either so things could get explosive.'

One too many? Bethan had clearly had a whale of a time on her night on the town
